descriptions: You can download a trial version of this app to try it for 20 minutes for free.
You won’t be charged anything when this free trial ends. You can’t make in-app purchases or use add-on content during this free trial, but you’ll keep any achievements you earn.

display_long_description:
**✨ Play the top rated high-energy musical journey through space! ✨**

"One of the best VR rhythm games on the market. If you love music, want to improve your fitness, or simply want to immerse yourself in an experience like no other, the answer is clear."  -UploadVR 

[media]


[media]

"Each trip through space is a blast... I can see myself returning again and again." - Gaming Age

# GAME FEATURES

🤩 **Feel the Adrenaline:** Experience a lightspeed voyage across the stars. Swing at Supernovas in any direction, swirl through Stardust Trails, charge up Comets, and destroy incoming Asteroids. 

✨ **Free Your Flow:** Create your own style of movement and become the center of gravity. Never flow through a single level the same way twice!

🎶 **Discover New Music:** Vibe to a pulse-pounding hyperspace soundtrack as you journey across 36 unique areas within six different galaxies. 

🌌 **Create Constellations:** Gather star energy and create majestic constellations in the sky. Chill out in ‘Stargazer’ mode for a meditative retreat to observe your progress.

📆 **Play Daily Challenges:** Join the community and play new challenges each day. Tap into the real-time cycles of Earth’s moon for bonus incentives, and complete streaks to rise to the top of the leaderboards!

💎 **Grab Collectables:** Hone your skills and take a chance at mining the starfield for hidden crystals holding mysteries waiting to be discovered.

[media]
